Title: The Mask of Zorro
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Romance, Thriller, Western
Writer: Johnston McCulley (character Zorro), Ted Elliott (story), Terry Rossio (story), Randall Jahnson (story), John Eskow (screenplay), Ted Elliott (screenplay), Terry Rossio (screenplay)
Actors: José María de Tavira, Diego Sieres, Emiliano Guerra, Yolanda Orizaga
Plot: A young thief (Antonio Banderas), seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro (Sir Anthony Hopkins), who also pursues vengeance of his own.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 16 nominations.
